Ping Feevy about your new posts as soon as published.

== Description ==

[Feevy.com](http://feevy.com/) display content from other blogs at your website with just one simple html tag.

This plugin ping Feevy when you've published a new post, so it'll be displayed quicker in your friends Feevy's.

== Installation ==

1. Unzip the downloaded package and drop the Feevy ping folder in your Wordpress plugins folder
1. Log into your WordPress admin panel
1. Go to Plugins and “Activate” the plugin
1. Feevy ping is working! You can now publish new posts to make Feevy aware of it.
